inputs.name: version
inputs.label: Version
inputs.helpMarkDown:
Specify the version of Azure func tools to install. Ex:

2.7.1575
v2.7.1575
latest

messages.ErrorFetchingLatestVersion: An error occured while fetching the latest version info from %s. Error: %s. Downloading default stable version: %s.
messages.FuncDownloadFailed: Failed to download func tools from location %s. Error %s.
messages.NotAValidSemverVersion: Version not specified in correct format. Ex: 2.7.1575, v2.7.1575, latest
messages.SuccessfullyDownloaded: Successfully downloaded func tools %s. Download path: %s.
messages.VersionAlreadyInstalled: Func tool version %s is already installed. Installation path: %s.
